Negative_Review: Parking place too small and don t have two way traffic It looks like that you have to drive to a lower level however when you do that you will get a closed door so hard to drive slaloms back backwards slope up in a small place We had booked two rooms both rooms didn t had towers in the bathroom and only one bottle welcome water
Positive_Review: Good location nice breakfast also at the end of the breakf time friendly staff

Negative_Review: nothing major to complain about
Positive_Review: Location is great Easy access to two metro stations Supermarket bar restaurants near by Having the Tour Montparnasse tower nearby was a great landmark to find the hotel when endlessly walking the beautiful streets of Paris

Negative_Review: Two days of room cleaning were missed of a 4 night stay resulting in my having to call reception and ask for the job to be completed There was a shortage of toilet paper on day 2 A rep came up to give me a half a roll as he couldn t find any more He was obviously embarrassed but did eventually came back sometime later with a complete roll One of the bathroom sink drains was blocked I had to request it be fixed It did get fixed There are areas that could afford repair The back patio has loose wooden tiles that should be fixed There is an accident waiting to happen Clearly some of the furniture is old and needs replacing or fixing The clothes drying rack in the washroom wasn t working and the staff said they weren t going to fix it The room was very small Little space for 2 people to put their clothes so we left them in the suitcase Overall the breakfast was good but the veggies were not fresh Some of the channels were not working CNN for example I reported the problem twice and nothing was done about it Staff was nice but I think they are stretched I don t blame them rather I put the responsibility on the management of Holiday Inn Your 4 star hotel rates a 3 at best We were hoping for more
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly The location is very central The breakfasts is decent

Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like was our door was left wide open by the maid Luckily we had only been out a short while and nothing was missing but this could have been a lot worse Apart from this the hotel was great and I d stay here again
Positive_Review: The metro is literally right outside the hotel The room was very nice and the bed was really comfy which was great after the longs days walking around the city

Negative_Review: absurdly overpriced the normal price of the hotel is about 100 euros most of time but booking com charged us 330 euros per night which is totally absurd When we were booking the hotel we did not know the fair price of the hotel and the reception at the moment did not remind us either If we go to the reception and have an ask the price at that moment would be around 200 euros We totally understand that the price would go up if the demand is high or else reasons but it does not mean that the price can soar into sky super rude staff a staff called Wiliam the supervisor on the morning was really rude We were discussing about the price issue described above and at first we were really polite and we only asked for a fair price say 200 euro per night but Wiliam did not even give us a smile but replied mechanically that they cannot give us ANY discount He meant that we have to pay the price discussed above even though everyone knows that it is ridiculous since we are stupid More annoyingly when we were having conversation for some times he stopped and talked to another customer without any explanation and he was muttering something in French which I don t think would be something good I asked him why he ended our conversation abruptly and he said every customer has only 15 minutes of conversation he also talked to us in front of another customer that we have occupied too much time letting another customer wait too long but there were at least three staff on the front desk no towel yeah you hear me in a four star hotel there was only one towel in the room one night We asked the front desk one staff only replied Sorry we are out of stock Sadly sorry means nothing and does not solve any problem cemetery behind the hotel of course the hotel won t tell you that until you check in There are two headings one to the cemetery and one to the main road which is noisy
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Wallpaper was torn in our room and we couldn t open our window to aerate the room The linens also had a funny smell
Positive_Review: Great location subway station right infront of the hotel 6 stops away from champs elysees

Negative_Review: Limited choice for breakfast The underground parking is very dirty One elevator under renovation
Positive_Review: Confortable room very close to Montparnasse train station Kind staff Lot of restaurant at proximity

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is a great hotel for business close to the Montparnasse train station so easy access to all kind of modes of transport Certainly will be considered next time I vacation in Paris the location is really awesome with a nice lively street next door and access to 3 different metro lines in less than 10 min walk Great rooms comfortable well appointed Overall really satisfied booking com has outdone itself as usual

Negative_Review: I didn t like that I had to slam my bedroom door in order to close it That is my only complaint and it was annoying having to pull very hard each time to close it
Positive_Review: I thought the rooms were well appointed and the staff was very accommodating I also thought that it was conveniently located as the Gaite metro stop is right outside the hotel s front door

Negative_Review: There was no mineral water in the room and no mini bar in comparison with the Kowloon Holiday Inn and Mumbai Holiday Inn The corridor to my room 1st floor had a non finished wall and one of the wall lamps had a broken cover Due to the poor light it looked really spooky when I went to my room at 11pm the first night of my arrival
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Everything was alright but the centre was a little bit far By walk it is about 30 min
Positive_Review: The place was very good It is little bit far from city centre but metro station is about 5 metres from hotel so you can go anywhere with metro Personal was very helpful rooms clean

Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: Perfect stuff Thank you so much to Black lady on reception she was behind the desk around lunch time when we move in She was absolutely helpfull Defenitely we will come again for min of 3 nights

Negative_Review: The smell in the bathroom the cleaner who do not clean your room and put don t disturb sign on your room I complained to reception They promissed to repaire the fridge the day after Nothing was done
Positive_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: Carpet was old one elevator was not working shower did not contain water well Whole bathroom got wet every time someone took a shower
Positive_Review: The location was near the metro station restaurants etc Room was small but bed and pillows were good Staff was helpful to English speaking patrons

Negative_Review: Two staff members on in the morning were very helpful in swapping my room following being woken in the night twice by the stench of sewage in my room Staff on in the evening didn t really have a good grasp of English which didn t help checking in I asked for directions to a race my son was to run again I asked the same staff members for directions and the internet wasn t working well at all therefore no directions for me advice was to get a uber I paid for my stay upon arrival and upon check it was told I need to pay government tax again I had no idea what they were on about as they didn t explain nothing to me upon arrival And following the smell of sewage and very poor wifi which lost signal so frequently it was ridiculous and that the heated towel rail had its dial hanging off by the exposed wires I was so angry Overa would never return
Positive_Review: Two daytime staff members were nice and helpful

Negative_Review: Negotiating the French underground without escalators or lifts at lower levels but the French people were very friendly and helpful It was a little disappointing that our hotel provided only one large bath towel and gave us a small hand towel to use instead saying that we were lucky to have it as it was the last one We discovered this lack of provision at 10 00 pm at night
Positive_Review: A particularly good wine restaurant nearby and easy access to the train station

Negative_Review: The breakfast was not consistent one day all was fresh and nice the second day things were stale and they were out of condiments
Positive_Review: That kids eat breakfast for free

Negative_Review: The rooms were generally nice but there were some deficiencies one room had a bit of water leakage one room had an issue with the toilet In addition we booked one room separately not via Booking and this created confusion with the payments etc for which I needed the assistance of Booking to resolve it Booking did a really good job there
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good though personnel was a bit understaffed to arrange for all guests The personnel was very friendly and willing to assist in problems

Negative_Review: No gel or shampoo in the over bath dispenser Exposed wires in lamp plug Big leak around shower screen Confusion about credit card my original card had been destroyed and replaced it had a new number
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Comfortable hotel room Nice thanks for providing free tea coffee facilities in room
Positive_Review: Hotel room bedding comfort is excellent but needs to provide daily house keeping items adequate We were two persons but towels and toiletries were not enough

Negative_Review: Beds were VERY uncomfortable I have a pain in my back now No saftey Safe in the cupboards Breakfast was cooked in UNPROFESSIONAL way
Positive_Review: Nothing Staff wre not helpful Not much variety in Breakfast Staff did not pay attention to the Customers

Negative_Review: The room was smaller than pictures and the room had a damp smell that lasted our entire stay Breakfast was small on choices but ok Took a while though for bread to come out
Positive_Review: Location was good

Negative_Review: One thing we really missed that you do not have a swimming pool sauna Specially after highly charged you should give these services too
Positive_Review: Atmosphere is really nice

Negative_Review: The place was constantly under renovation with many of its facilities not working including the elevator and air conditioning Mostly beware if anyone there suggests taking an airport shuttle I paid a deposit for one which never showed up at the agreed upon time and I had to strongly encourage a staff member to return my money This hotel needs a new plan
Positive_Review: The staff most who were friendly and helpful despite the challenging conditions

Negative_Review: Breakfast is very poor not enough variety and very expensive the room doors are not fixed properly and every time someone shuts the door they wake you up very loud one of the lifts wasn t working Never enough bread or juice always had to ask and wait for everything coffee is terrible Not enough towels provided in your room
Positive_Review: The two male staff at the reception were great and also the staff at the breakfast Metro very close which is handy

Negative_Review: It was a terrible hotel in terms of every aspects The hotel was so old dirty It smells like a garbage The room for the first night was like a nightmare not working minibar shower and the bed was poor With my request they ve changed our room but dirt and bad smell was still in Even booking com should get rid of this hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I was in room 605 the building work was going on lift also in morning of 19 04 in morning a Man was fixing the lock in room 604 early morning it was nightmare I paid a lot of money for 4 night it was not good I wish I stayed in Gard the L Est holiday in I ve got the picture if you need them
Positive_Review: Transport lovai

Negative_Review: Noisy in the morning The mattress not comfortable at all Needs to be replaced
Positive_Review: The location was excellent It was close to everything The neighborhood is very nice

Negative_Review: once lift was out of order i am ok but for this hotel at least 2 lifts are necessary
Positive_Review: at least it had parking although included charges but at all in compare with other hotels was really good

Negative_Review: Noisy road so had to keep the window closed This made the room very hot The showerhead was broken but we managed with the handheld shower in the bath It was a weekend so no maintenance available Maybe ask for a room at the back
Positive_Review: Helpful staff speaking good English 2 excellent Boulangeries close by with fantastic fresh savoury and desserts and good coffee at reasonable prices Short walk to Paris Montpasse train and Metro station Loads of choice of Restaurants and bars nearby There is a kettle in the room which pleased us as we had our own green tea bags Checkout not til 12 so good if you don t have an early start

Negative_Review: Only one elevator no air conditioner no free bottles of water i was at the fifth floor and you can hear the noise of the street there was WIFI but never working you couldn t connect to the internet never i only had acces once in 6 days
Positive_Review: Great location there is a metro station just outside the door of the hotel Gare Montparnasse is just at 3 minutes walk from the hotel

Negative_Review: Disabled access room was too hot and AC didn t work Bathroom door was auto closing with no way of keeping it open Room was right on main road and have to have window open as room was too hot Room was opposite an advertising screen which kept waking me up as curtains didn t work
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Let down by the chambermaid Day 1 free bottled water half drunk in fridge chocolate drink again half used and wrapper placed back in the tray Day 2 we hung towels back on the rails to re use all but 1 removed with no replacements reception took 45 mins to find replacements meant late getting out for dinner Day 3 no water provided we gave up
Positive_Review: Good location easy access to train and metro Variety at breakfast Good wifi Loads of good restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: Woken very early by drilling in the room next to us then straight after maids knocking on the door Rooms could do with painting as well as there was damp marks around the window which had been attempted to be covered by the curtains
Positive_Review: Bed was comfortable staff very friendly

Negative_Review: Room 105 had the coldest bathroom in the world it was almost like a walk in fridge the heating in the room left a lot to be desired To go on no plug for the bath the top shower head had no proper control knob and the wind coming through the window aperture OMG
Positive_Review: Staff location and the price

Negative_Review: I arrived in from a transatlantic night flight and had hoped to be able to get a few hours sleep when I arrived at the hotel at 3pm but the hotel is being renovated and drilling went on until 5pm Strange as I had said to the receptionist when I checked in that I wanted a quiet room and she did not say anything about the possibility of hearing a drill
Positive_Review: I had requested a high floor with a room away from the elevator and got that The bed was very comfortable and the room clean The hotel is about a 2 minute walk from Montparnasse train station Around the corner from the hotel there are several small theaters and lots of restaurants also

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were upgraded upon arrival for no reason at all which was a lovely surprise staff were all friendly and helpful I asked for a hair dryer and was given one the wifi worked absolutely fine plenty of people moaning about this hotel but you can t win them all haha

Negative_Review: Empty mini bar No battery in the remote control and nothing in stock so no TV all night The mattress was not comfortable
Positive_Review: The location is perfect and the room size is good The staff is friendly

Negative_Review: One of elevator was broken We used stairs often
Positive_Review: The stuff a few of them at the check in and all of the housekeepers were such hardwokers Receptionist for my check in she was very thoughtful Only one condition one of elevator was broken and gave people who were staying inconvenience

Negative_Review: Everything else useless hotel no facilities no restaurant and no room service
Positive_Review: Only location just ourside the gaite metro station and one staff of hotel Mr Florian

Negative_Review: Everything
Positive_Review: The room was very small for 2 people and the furniture had kids in it We could not access any English channels The staff couldn t care less The only good thing about the holiday was the location

Negative_Review: None
Positive_Review: The buffeet menu is an ordinary one but the croissant were delicious the room was clean but not too big The receptionist was very helpful and nice

Negative_Review: Not a thing
Positive_Review: Perfect location Walking distance to all of the great attractions Paris has to offer Holiday Inn never fails me Great location Beautiful and updated comfortable rooms

Negative_Review: We did not take the breakfast too expensive 15 euros compared to German breakfast 8 50 euros also the choice and quality of the food cannot be compared Apparently the Germans complained to the staff about it
Positive_Review: The location near the Gare Montparnasse

Negative_Review: some of the staff were wonderful but not super keen to help One staff in particular seemed unable e and uncertain about helping me with a dilemma at all
Positive_Review: Neat clean tidy great position

Negative_Review: The heating in the lobby It was uncomfortably hot and the staff had some bo due to wearing suits in the heat Takeaway food had been left on the balcony which made the room smell slightly and someone had been smoking on the balcony which also went into our room
Positive_Review: Top floor room really big Friendly staff Good value for money Didn t blow my mind but comfortable accomendation

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Bed was really comfy and a baby bed was already installed in the room before our arrival Location was really convenient close the Gare Montparnasse and metro stations

Negative_Review: Was supposed to be internet connection in our room didnt work despite turning phones on and off at the recommendation of Reception staff Reception lobby did however have a good internet connection
Positive_Review: Good location next to Gaite underground metro with good links to the rest of the city Good food and bistros places to drink just around the corner

Negative_Review: The area was a little rough prostatutes on the streets less than 50m from the hotel front door and a road of interesting establishments less than 50 metres from the hotel front door I wanted to stay very central it was heard to determine the area until we got there it s not what it s described as from that perspective However the hotel was clean and the staff where very friendly and attentive speaking excellent English which is a real bonus The dining room could be improved as it s small and to close to the lobby it s basically in the lobby Also you ended up sitting on tables with others which isn t great if you just want to sit with your family A few touches would change this The breakfast selection is good though
Positive_Review: Metro station right outside the hotel excellently convenient to travel

Negative_Review: Lifts often need wait too long Beds are a little bit noisy if you see what I mean but very comfortable
Positive_Review: Very good location close to Gait district with lot of bar brasseries restaurants Good comfort in room nice personnel Standard Holiday Inn design Bed s comfort is high level

Negative_Review: check in staffs were very slow
Positive_Review: excellent location good room size in Paris excellent value for money got the bargain price from booking com you can not get any cheaper than this for this quality

Negative_Review: Tea and coffe making in the wardrobe Didnt find it initially
Positive_Review: Loved the Welcome Vincent gave us They have stored our bags for a week while we travel Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: poor sound insulation we could hear TV from the next room and noisy young residents
Positive_Review: the view on the trees of the cemetery the location next to rue de la gait and metro gait

Negative_Review: We booked for 2 adults 1 child but the gave us a twin bed hoped they gave us the double also baby bed because there are a plenty of the room
Positive_Review: The stuff and the service is good there are helpful

Negative_Review: Toilet has no place to wash your hands so you must exit and go into bathrrom to clean up thus contaminating handles of toilet and bathroom doors Very poor design
Positive_Review: Fluffy bed and pillows excellent location luggage storage during day of departure

Negative_Review: No one to take your bag to the room and back Room was extremely small You could not even sit properly on the toilet too close to the wall Amenities in the bathroom not replenished The iron and ironboard are a disgrace Room overseeing cemetery
Positive_Review: Bed and pillows

Negative_Review: the very first day I didn t get a map the staff could have offer the map to see the city in the very first day just as a courtesy without waiting for the guest to ask for directions the scramble eggs are not well cooked
Positive_Review: I loved the bed and the pillow very confortable

Negative_Review: The lifts were small and had to wait a long time to get one at peak times Needed to ask for items at breakfast that had run out
Positive_Review: convenient location close to metro station Room clean and staff pleasant

Negative_Review: No security at the entrance of the hotel even though the staff was cool We definitely didn t get the best room as we got it on sales That was disappointing actually
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Missed emptying rubbish bin from previous client Tea coffee facilities basic Not enough milk for a second cup Could add some TV selections which are not just news on every chanel
Positive_Review: Great location near Gare Montparnasse TGV and airport bus Enormous very comfortable bed good aircon no noise to speak of from street

Negative_Review: It would be more convenient if the toilet was integrated with the bathroom AC was a bit noisy
Positive_Review: A typical Holiday Inn quality You know what you will get Room was clean and usefully designed Location was good the metro station is right in front of the hotel Car park is easy and convenient

Negative_Review: The car park has only 10 spaces so it is worthwhile to ring up and reserve a space prior to your booking Also the toilets and sinks were across the hall from each other which was odd
Positive_Review: Beds had very comfortable and different types of cushions to suit everyone Excellent location right next to a metro which you can use to access the whole of Paris

Negative_Review: The WiFi signal was very poor and hardly working
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy Location near the train station was perfect for us It is a reasonable distance from touristic attractions too

Negative_Review: I didn t get the map the first day so it would have been very helpful for me since it was my first time in Paris
Positive_Review: I love the pillows and the bed very confortable

Negative_Review: All the towels were removed on 1st day of room cleaning and weren t replaced On enquiring at the front desk wasn t treated well With the exception of this front desk staff all others were great Food was monotonous and repeated the same thing every day but acceptable Some towels and bath mats were little dirty Bed frame was a little dirty and mouldy
Positive_Review: Centrally located close to Gare Montparnasse But I preferred getting down at Gait stop Metro 13 which is just at the doorstep of the hotel Almost all front desk staff were very friendly Room was clean

Negative_Review: Nothing all good
Positive_Review: Great for catching train montpernasse station Beds comfortable and clean air conditioning and hair dryer and tea making facilities and free wifi

Negative_Review: The rooms were smelly small and the furniture was too old Even the hotel s lobby was smelly
Positive_Review: Only the helpful staff who will definitely won t be able to compensate the missing comfort

Negative_Review: Small rooms Very degraded and Dirty Old towels totally ripped and smelly The shower door was broken and they had put a string around to attach it A fridge that didn t work Very unconfortable bed Only one cup in the room eventhough we were two No water or sleepers or bathrobe Nothing to do with a 4 star hotel I would have given just two stars Next time i will go to a simple Ibis it would be cleaner and much cheaper Oh and eventhough i asked three times their wifi NEVER WORKED The elevators were old and scary too This hotel doesn t worth at all And it is too expensive for what it is
Positive_Review: The front desk lady was very sweet

Negative_Review: Drains in the sinks did not work Tub too tall and dangerous for older women to get in and out Baseboards were not dusted and thick with dust and carpets were not swept The sheer curtains hung off the hooks and were never adjusted The black out curtain was frayed and dirty Coffee cups were put back with previous lipstick on the rim and not cleaned Glass drinking glasses were never replaced No supervision of the cleaning personnel
Positive_Review: The breakfast was good most of the 5 days we were there

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location near the Montparnasse station can t be beat as it s also a big metro hub and easy to go anywhere from there Also there are buses going back and forth to the airport stopping right there much more comfortable than the metro with luggage as everyone can sit down and they put the luggage down the bus Very comfortable hotel great bed great breakfast buffet

Negative_Review: The staff Some of them are not the most friendly person only 1 out of 4 staff I encountered that is actually nice Before coming to France I heard the French are not friendly and proud It turned out to be half true half wrong In Lourdes people turned out to be nice However in Paris people turned out to be rude
Positive_Review: The bed is the best The room looks luxurious and it does imo It is clean the bed is huge there is also sofa bed The bathroom is nice as well

Negative_Review: I was only there for an overnight stay but found no problems
Positive_Review: I did not have breakfast at the hotel as I had to leave before the breakfast room opened

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We can only say all the best about our stay at this hotel We give our highest score to the reception staff comfort and housekeeping We are a young couple that were on the go for our entire stay which means that we needed a big breakfast to conquer all the beauty that Paris has to offer us as tourists we needed a comfortable bed and some peace and quiet in the night and thats what we got Also a good thing about this hotel is the location We were so close to all the happenings but still in a part of the city where we could experience the typical small streets boutiques creperies and brasseries

Negative_Review: Breakfast was not very good unfortunately one day found something that had expired
Positive_Review: Bedding was very comfortable good location walking distance to a RER station and metro station next to it

Negative_Review: The room door had a push button to open and so did the bathroom door As the buttons were next to each other as were the doors there was a risk of exposure going to the bathroom in the night
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Staff were very unfriendly Breakfast was the same and very limited Rooms were tiny Used towels instead of clean towels in bathroom Sink was blocked bed site light not working Wifi signal was so poor it was impossible to use it Ignore All positive views I travel frequently and live in Hotels this Hotel is like a 2 star don t be fooled by the positive comments
Positive_Review: Location is the only positive thing about this Hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I really like the Hotel staff The front office staff were so wonderful They answered all of our questions including where to find Paris Hop on Hop Off bus I also like the location It s surrounded by almost anything from cafes grocery stores gift shops etc etc

Negative_Review: Maybe to have an evening meal at the hotel when you arrive late from meetings but there are plenty of places to eat around the hotel
Positive_Review: Despite the busy location the room was really quiet and comfortable The staff were great and the hotel is located very close to one of the main Metro lines

Negative_Review: They did not reserved the room as per the date I have chosen it seems they are doing scam with people coming there from a distance I will not suggest any one to go with booking com
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Although the staff was efficient they were not friendly The towels were clean but not very fluffy at all decor was dated it totally lacked personality
Positive_Review: The hotel was clean and well run the room I had was spacious and the location was very central The subway was just a few steps away restaurants around the corner and the bus to the airport was a block away

Negative_Review: I used booking com who did not connect with hotel properly and the hotel charged us for two rooms for same dates we only reserved used one room but they charged for two room
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Internet speed was horrible for a 4 stars hotel Very very slow Noisy street I was on the 7th floor and could still hear the cars and street s noise Better soundproofing would be good
Positive_Review: Metro line M13 just in front of the hotel Big modern and clean room Separate bath and toilet rooms Selection of pillows hard and soft Staff helpful and smiling

Negative_Review: the printer at the reception to allow guests to print boarding cards or other documents was out of order However this was not signalled but found out after getting the documents ready for printing A bit cumbersome and annoying
Positive_Review: very friendly and helpful personnel

Negative_Review: Despite of the real hard work from the Staff they have several limitations in terms of space for breakfast which can be a challenge to have a nice and calm breakfast in the rush hours
Positive_Review: The location is perfect just in front of the Gait metro station and the hotel has absolute everything that any guest needs in terms of facilities

Negative_Review: Nothing much to mention But it is a small Business Hotel with no much Facilities
Positive_Review: The location of the Hotel is so nice it is surrounded by small coffee shops and the Metro is just in front of the Hotel Entrance The Staff have a very good customer service and especially the Male Receptionists

Negative_Review: 1 hotel receptions are not helpful fire alarm disturbing late night without advisory from the hotel No one pickup the call and no one showed up to explain the problem house keeping too laid back guest need to ask the house keeping to refill the shower gels replace the towels etc
Positive_Review: Near the metro station

Negative_Review: no parking reserved even when specially requested no baby crib ready even when specially requested had to pay for retrieving the phone that fell in hotel s lift shaft part of hotel high chair unavailable for baby in the restaurant
Positive_Review: location comfortable bed clean

Negative_Review: The room did not feel clean and shower room had no towels when we entered The shower room had two sinks one of which had drainage issues and the other was leaking at the bottom Quite an disappointment really and will definitely not roccomend it to anyone
Positive_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: The internet was a little bit slowly On weekends breakfast is served only from 7 00 AM It was not possible to pay by any credit card
Positive_Review: Breakfast was delicious Towels were changed daily No noise Good rest

Negative_Review: The tv movie didnt work so had to watch french tv for 5 day when im eglish stain on matris toilet handle fell off water leakin out of bath rude staff
Positive_Review: The bed

Negative_Review: waiting to check in from 3 pm till 6 pm cause the room was not ready wifi connection was very very poor
Positive_Review: The location was perfect the room was comfort and clean room view was good

Negative_Review: The female staff was quite rude Also I was told that a pull out chair bed was available in every twin room and it was not I tried to work with that hotel to acquire a room and they were less than accommodating my friend had to sleep on the floor
Positive_Review: It was close to the metro and several dining locations The room was clean and that bathroom was nice

Negative_Review: Rooms are extremly small breakfast is bad with very limited choices wifi so bad i was shocked as its suppose to be a 4stars hotel however its not even near 2stars one day i wanted to get something from room service at midnight and the feedback i received on the phone is that we dont have anybody to come to your room so you have to come down REALLY Again Rooms are very small i mean that we had three bags and we couldnt even know where to put them
Positive_Review: Location is good near the metro station gaite other than that NOTHING

Negative_Review: If you have a room with boulevard view it could be a little bit noisy because of the traffic
Positive_Review: Great location just near the metro station Great service very pleasant reception Great breakfast Very clean Wifi all around the hotel even in rooms

Negative_Review: No internet available and employees attitude was not very helpful Hotel seems old and in need of refurbishment bad beds mine was tilted to one side unconfortable dated not pleasant
Positive_Review: Location for the purpose of our trip

Negative_Review: location of hotel was just a bit out of the way for our needs our booking fault
Positive_Review: Florian at reception was fantastic 100 with help and enquiries great bathroom

Negative_Review: When we turned up to our initial room the room was untidy bed not made and junk all over the floor Also on departure we had a bottle of wine misplaced and not returned this causing more frustration
Positive_Review: Location to metro is fantastic and the surroundings area is nice and quaint

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: staff very professional and polite room clean and quiet Easy wifi connection Bathroom comfortable Price positive for Paris Walking disrance from Montparmasse train station When in Paris I will be back

Negative_Review: Was a bit too warm in the room and difficult to control the temperatue e
Positive_Review: Very convenient to Gare Montparneasse with plenty of restaurants near by Hotel staff were friendly and room was clean a small fair amount of room

Negative_Review: The staff was a bit snooby The room a was small the air condition did not work nor did the window but the hotel did change our room which was great because we had the window opened the bad thing was that the room was even smaller then the first
Positive_Review: I loved the fact that there was a metro right outside the hotel Location

Negative_Review: Due to the busy location a lot of street noise woke me frequently during the night So maybe better glazing would help with that issue This is my only criticism
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly room comfortable clean warm Lots of restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: There were no outlets in the bathroom so I could not blow dry or curl my hair I had to stand in the hallway to use a plug and stretch to look at myself in the hall mirror I had a nonsmoking room but I had to go through a smoked filled hallway to get to my room The maids closet was next door and they were extremely loud I also asked for a full bed and they just pushed two twins together They only serve breakfast for 18 euros which I though was steep
Positive_Review: I liked the fact that everything was within walking distance restaurants shops train and bus stations Montparnasse is a beautiful town The receptionists all spoke English which was very comforting Everyone in the city was so friendly and most spoke English

Negative_Review: We had a room to the street side and that was very busy and noisy For that reason we could not open the windows It was quite warm in the room and opening a window would have helped For the rest all was fine
Positive_Review: The very friendly staff

Negative_Review: When we arrived we realized that there was only one towel and the staff s answer was that we had to wait until late afternoon before we could get one more towel We also wanted to have two keycards but that was impossible to get It s the directors rule we were told So when my husband was out running early in the morning I had to stumble in the dark to reach the toilet and I could forget my reading
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the breakfast and that the hotel is situated near the Metro

Negative_Review: THE HOTEL WAS LOVELY BUT IT IS JUST STANDARD MAYBE SHOP ABOUT SAME AREA IF YOU WANT A BIT MORE LUXURY
Positive_Review: GREAT LOCATION CLOSE TO TRAIN STATION AND 25MIN WALK TO TOURIST HOTSPOTS GREAT FOOD DRINK GREAT SHOPPING NICE PLACE TO SIT AND JUST WATCH EVERYONE AND EVERYTHING

Negative_Review: When I was checking out early morning there was a long queue and only one staff member to help It was a very slow process
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic for a transit stopover with the Gare Montparnasse in proximity and the Roissy Bus to from the airports

Negative_Review: When I booked the hotel I included breakfast as part of the rate and requested for gluten free breakfast At first they told me that breakfast was extra at 15 Euros per person but when I showed the reservation they provided breakfast at no extra cost There was no gluten free bread for breakfast and when I asked them they nodded like it is what it is even though they told us that they would provide This was the only hotel during our 2 weeks of travel in France that did not provide what we requested
Positive_Review: Being near Gare Montparnasse is a big plus You can access the metro and train lines as well as bus to either of airports pretty easily The station is about one and one half block away

Negative_Review: The price was to expensive for the service they provide They didn t have room service The personal of reception was terrible The room was too small The parking should be including on the room price
Positive_Review: The only moment that we were treat it good was only the guy from the breakfast He was servicial and polaid

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Superb location immediately 2 mins walk from Montparnasse station and used the local metro stop at Gaite to access other parts of Paris which is immediately outside the hotel

Negative_Review: Rooms are very small it was not mentioned in the room description that it is 12m2 Bathrooms are not clean pipes are blocked
Positive_Review: Metro station few steps from hotel Freindly staff

Negative_Review: Would have been nice if the room sizes were a little bigger though I am sure they had that option which I did not see when booking Window was broken so was unable to open it but the air conditioning more than suited our needs
Positive_Review: I liked the friendly and informative staff The check in was quick the location is amazing and so close the train line

Negative_Review: you can hear all through the door the cling lady just very straight come to the room without even waiting the permission no water in the room poor breakfast
Positive_Review: my room was faced to the garden cemetery very quiet

Negative_Review: Internet is very unstable Most of the time is offline For business trip that need Internet most of the time can forget this hotel
Positive_Review: The room is nice and clean Location is near train station and convenient Lots of restaurants around

Negative_Review: value for money score is low because I found the room price too expensive for a simple single i e child s bed direct neighborhood Blvd du Maine not very Parisien so very low on ambiance
Positive_Review: great location for quick easly access to train station

Negative_Review: I asked for quiet room they gave me a room in front the main street with a lot of noise They forgont the towel in the room I call 3 times and wait for 45 min to have a shower the bed was unconfortable first very bed experience in holiday inn
Positive_Review: it is really close to metro and to a lot of restaurants

Negative_Review: One of two lifts was not working properly it happens normally No problem The problem was anouncement of Hotel Staff Only one written A4 paper was attached to lift door in the floors and warning of not using Is it enough for Kids Olds and who may not see the page I heard one was shouting since she had used the lift without noticing the anounce paper
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The ambience did not reflect a Holiday Inn quality Hotel The beds were not comfortable at all Toilet was not clean This seems to be a n old property not well maintained The housekeeping was not upto the mark The used spoons from the coffee trays were not washed for the next day They were left as it is
Positive_Review: People at the reception were good Location of the hotel is good it has good access to restaurants and metro

Negative_Review: Unfriendly and u helpful staffs Slow and small lift Limited choice of breakfast No bell boy service
Positive_Review: Except the location we don t like anything about this hotel First they rated as 4 star hotel We arrived with 3 luggages and no bell boy and we have to carry our luggage to our own room We booked twin room but they gave us triple bed and made the room too squeeze Requested to remove 1 bed out of outreach room but they have no staff available to do that after5 pm Went downstairs to borrow staple for nylon document to use a while back in my room They claimed they only have 2 stapler and asked me bring my documents down to do in lobby The staffs are unfriendly unhelpful n never know how to smile The toilet is very smelly The good thing is their WiFi is very fast Near the hotel They have this very good vietnam restaurant Very authentic and taste good Super recommended must try Please don t try any Japanese food around there It taste horrible anyway very unhappy stay in this hotel Will never come back next stay Overrated Please improve on service for this price

Negative_Review: Cleaning staff knocking on door at 9a m 10a m wanting towels to be cleaned on check out day Fortunately one was aware that the French star system is unique to France
Positive_Review: Very central for touring

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: I believe we got what we expected paid for The air conditioning in our room could have worked better though in all fairness it was exceptionally hot muggy outside when we stayed there
Positive_Review: We had to catch an early train out of Montparnasse train station so the hotel s location was perfect I wouldn t necessarily stay in this area on a sightseeing trip to Paris but if you need to travel onwards by TGV to the West of France the location is top Rooms are standard not overly large but clean At EUR 15 breakfast isn t overpriced Relatively good selection of breakfast items including eggs

Negative_Review: when we leave asked the recetionpist to call a taxi after10 15 mins the taxi arrived and we when got on the car the price was already 12 euros I asked why he said it was the cost he drived to the hotel If we were not happy this he can cut the money at the end but he took us into a traffic jam later which I already told him to avoid at the end he didnt cut th e money and locked our luggages if we didnt give him the money to met this situation I was so disppointed at the hotel we trust hotel so let them to call a taxi for us but it led us to dangerous situation
